body.name: SGIN 10 Inch Tablet, 4GB RAM 64GB ROM, Android 12 Tablet with Case, Octa-Core 2.0Ghz Processor, 1280 * 800 IPS, 2MP+5MP Camera, 6000mAh, GPS, WiFi, Bluetooth (Ivory)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 46 mins
features: 【4GB+64GB Large-Capacity Tablets】This baby tablet is equipped with 4GB high-speed LPDDR4 random-access memory, enable to quicker launch speed, smoother interacting with the WiFi tablet for kids. 64GB large-capacity storage space, supporting 256GB TF card expansion. you can store as many ebooks, songs, pictures, videos, and games as you like and complete a variety of tasks by this toddler tablet.

【High-Performance Kids Tablet】 This Android 12 tablet is equipped with MT8183, with a high-performance 8-core CPU that has a frequency operation of up to 2GHz and can run multiple programs smoothly and handle multi-threaded tasks perfectly. Pre-install Android 12 OS with Google Mobile Service support, which can be easily operated by both kids and all age groups. In addition, 500 gram lightweight design making it comfortable to hold and easy to carry on the go.

【Full HD IPS Screen 10 inch Tablet & Proof-case】This 10 in tablet is equipped with a 10.1 inch high definition 1280*800 IPS screen with a narrow bezel design and built-in dual-speaker to provide you with more stunning auditory and visual effects. This kids tablets designed with case that can protect your tablet for kids 3-7 against dust,bumps, and drops off. The hollow protective case has the function of heat dissipation.

【Multifunctional hardware & ports Support】Naclud kids tablet with case build-in a clear 2MP front cam and a 5MP rear camera, Bluetooth 5.0, dual-band Wi-Fi(2.4G/5G), dual speakers, a Type-C interface (fast charger included), a Micro TF slot, and 3.5mm headphone jack. Bring you a full range of audio-visual experience and meet the need in different usage scenarios.

【Long Battery Life】 Providing a 6000mWh rechargeable battery, the power-efficient google tablet is designed to last for up to 5-7 hours on one charge (according to different scenarios) and easily charge via the Type-C port and rest assured the battery will last, so that furthest meet kid’s usage needs on the move for playing and learning. It's a great gift for kids in Birthday, Christmas, and New Year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 11 year old for our trip (from the U.S.) to Europe. The quality is great for the price. It's definitely better than inclusiveness (and inappropriate ads) that we noticed with the Kindle Fire tablets we'd bought our kids in the past. There are only 2 issues I'm that aware of with this tablet.(Issue 1) While traveling, we weren't able to sign into one of the hotels' guest Wi-Fi network. The tablet doesn't pop up with the sign in page after you connect to a guest Wi-Fi network (unsecured, but then opens a sign in page after connecting). All of our other phones and devices had no issues.With most of the networks, I could open the browser and go to the default router network IP address, and that would force the sign in page to come up in the browser. However, that method did not work at one of the hotels where we were staying for a week. We even took the tablet to a restaurant and used their unsecure Wi-Fi network to make sure his tablet was updated to the newest version.On the third day at the hotel, he told one of the hotel employees about his issue, and they were nice enough to sign him into their actual employee Wi-Fi network.(Issue 2) We can't seem to find an Auto Adjustment option for the Brightness on the tablet. If he was inside, he would have the brightness lower, but then when he'd take it outside during the day, you couldn't see the screen to adjust the brightness so you could see it outside. Again, we did ensure we were on the latest software version while we were on the trip, so this is a current issue at the time of writing this review.I'm hoping they'll fix both issues in a future update. They're definitely not big enough issues to make the tablet not worth purchasing... just an inconvenience/annoyance. Both issues are software related and not hardware, so they are fixable issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this tablet for my youngster so that she can look at books, listen to music and play educational games on it. We started by taking photos with it, which are of great quality and turned them into stories for her grandmas and grandpas. She had so much fun doing it. She also loved decorating it with the provided stickers. The sound is great also. We are still playing around and testing out all the features, but this was definitely a home run. The whole family loves it. In addition, it comes complete with a protective cover that has a built in stand, making it something that will survive tiny, messy, clumsy hands. Great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 10 inch tablet
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely great tablet for the price. The 10 inch size is awesome with a perfect sense touch screen. It loaded all my progarms with plenty of room to spare. The charging cable attaches at the top which I love. I've had it almost 3 weeks, have used it daily and it has performed with perfection. The second photo is the 10 inch tablet in my old 8 inch holder. It's definitely worth the price over the big store brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How powerful it is.
reviews.reviewText: The biggest thing that impressed me with this tablet is it's capability to expand it's memory to one terabyte. It was super impressive coming in 120 gig of rom, but to be able to expand it 1 terabyte meant it was the most powerful tablet I know of. It is able to process all of that without slowing down, and I don't have to worry about running out of memory. I can actually use it as a major computer without any worries. A convenient small computer that does the job of a large computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: This is nice to give to the kids on trips or long car rides so they can watch Netflix

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST TABLET EVER
reviews.reviewText: I am a computer programmer in school who needed a good tablet. It was packaged really well and arrived 3 days early. This tablet has an amazing processor on it which allows me to play any of my video game emulators and input code at will. There's plenty of storage on it to download whatever I want. I would recommend this tablet for anyone looking for a great quality tablet.
